Adding to my article on Diego Correa tomorrow here is a clip which is not mentioned in the story

Correa

as a senior remained in Happy Valley when the team played rival Ohio State

because Penn State could not take every player to Columbus Ohio for the October game.Penn

State coach Barry Gorman usually leaves five players behind and for the Ohio

State trip more forwards than midfielders traveled PERIOD It was the first time this year the senior was asked to stay home PERIOD Matheus Braga

recalled the Ohio State trip and talking to Correa after the Lions  loss PERIOD

Braga said PERIOD This

didnt stop Correa from following the games live stats feed on the Internet or

receiving text messages from the coaches and players PERIOD Correa said PERIOD Monahan
